section.name: Welcome to the Lutece Project
section.p: Lutece is a portal engine which allows you to easily create your websites or intranets based upon HTML,XML.. content. This open-source software is implemented in Java and based on Apache Software Foundation projects (i.e. Jakarta and XML projects). Lutece provides a user friendly interface for portal management and therefore no specific technical skills are required.
Lutece is free and is distributed under a BSD-like license.
In the current version technical documentation and sources are in English but administration user interface is actually in French. French users are invited to consult the french site.
